effect_entries.effect: Teaches Hyper Beam to a compatible Pokémon.
effect_entries.short_effect: Teaches Hyper Beam to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.text:
強い　光線を
相手に　発射して　攻撃する。
次の　ターンは　動けなくなる。

The target is attacked with a powerful beam.
The user can’t move on the next turn.

Colpisce il nemico con un potente raggio.
Chi la usa salta il turno successivo per
recuperare energia.

Quien lo usa se mueve tan rápido que deja una
estela de sí mismo que aumenta la Evasión.

Eine äußerst starke Attacke, die viel Schaden
anrichtet. Anwender muss sich in der
nächsten Runde ausruhen.

Projette un puissant rayon sur l’ennemi.
Le lanceur doit se reposer au tour suivant.

강한 광선을
상대에게 발사하여 공격한다.
다음 턴은 움직일 수 없다.

つよい　こうせんを　はっしゃする。
つかった　つぎのターンは　はんどうで
うごけなくなる。

The target is attacked with a powerful
beam. The user must rest on the next
turn to regain its energy.

The target is attacked with a powerful
beam. The user must rest on the next
turn to regain its energy.

Projette un puissant rayon sur
l’ennemi. Le lanceur doit se reposer
au tour suivant.

The foe is attacked with a powerful
beam. The user must rest on the next
turn to regain its energy.

The foe is attacked with a powerful
beam. The user must rest on the next
turn to regain its energy.

The foe is attacked with a powerful
beam. The user must rest on the next
turn to regain its energy.

A severely damaging
attack that makes
the user rest on
the next turn.

recharging the
next turn.
